safetyTips: All our staff are trained fully in food hygiene regulations, COVID health and safety for key workers, all staff carry hand sanitiser and disposable safety gloves.
name: The Charlwood Delivery
address: The Charlwood, 12 The Street, Charlwood RH6 0BE
description: Normally an amazing restaurant. On the 20 March we became an amazing food delivery operations - supplying fresh quality food and groceries (meats, veg, fruit, dairy, provisions) and restaurant quality hot takeaway food and drinks.
